definition[0]: an office worker who is only employed temporarily
example[0]: Carol’s temping until she can find another job.
definition[2]: a person, especially a secretary, who is employed to work in an office for only a short or limited period of time while someone is absent or while there is a lot of work to do
example[1]: There is a shortage of good temps in London.
example[2]: We’ve got a temp in this week.
example[3]: a temp agency (=a business that supplies temps, especially secretaries)
example[4]: He has been temping for an accountancy firm.
